title: (x) Sam's Club baseline - Arbitrary Sans {Yves, Dav}
content:
Hi,

I need an ID on the font used in the tagline.

Thanks,

Ed

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sam's%20Logo1.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sam's Logo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/typophile.com/files/Sam's%20Logo1_0.jpg) | 179.87 KB |

 [‹ (x) Serenity logo script, similar to Shelley - ITC Edwardian Script {Forrest}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/typophile.com/node/16835 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Swiss Design 2003 - Berthold Bodoni {Yves, Chris} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/typophile.com/node/16829 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vivirenet

comments.content: That’s [Barry Deck](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Barry%252BDeck)’s [Arbitrary Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=E.2993.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=ESTAMOS+EN+NEGOCIO&sampleSize=32), a classic from the [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre) library.

’ [Arbitrary](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=77)’, by Barry Deck..

_Edit-A-Bit.: Nah, One minute, Yves.. One minute.. :)_

Dav

BTW Mr. Jimenez, can you please make sure that the samples you post are [in RGB-mode](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222004931/http:/typophile.com/forums/typeid/faq/#Q_3). Your CMYK JPEG didn’t show up in Firefox, and I had to switch to Safari to be able to view the sample (and I _still_ was faster than Dav... B-).

Yves has practice rubbing it in because of the  
lotion he has to constantly apply to his dome.

hhp
Yup, I’m evil that way. B-)
